title: Chocolate Syrup

ingredients.content: ½ vanilla bean pod, cut into pieces
3 ½ oz cocoa powder, (approx. 8 heaping tbsp)

preparations.content: Place sugar and vanilla pod into mixing bowl and grind <b>25 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add water and salt, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and reduce <b>9 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Add cocoa powder, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and reduce <b>4 min/Varoma/speed 4<b>. Transfer chocolate syrup into a bottle or small carafe and serve hot or cold.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with desserts such as ice cream, semolina pudding, vanilla pudding, fresh fruit, pancakes, etc.
This chocolate syrup is well tolerated by many allergy sufferers, as it is dairy-free and nut-free.
This chocolate syrup will keep for weeks in the refrigerator.
Add <b>7 oz milk<b> to any syrup remaining in the mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/175°F/speed 2<b> to enjoy a delicious hot chocolate drink.

To make a thicker chocolate spread for bread: after final reduction place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and reduce chocolate syrup a further <b>2-3 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
